name: Raytheon Technologies Corporation
description: Raytheon Technologies Corporation is a multinational aerospace and defense conglomerate formed by the merger of Raytheon Company and United Technologies Corporation in April 2020. Headquartered in Waltham, Massachusetts, the company specializes in advanced technology products and services for both commercial and military applications. Raytheon Technologies operates through four primary business segments: Collins Aerospace, Pratt & Whitney, Raytheon Intelligence & Space, and Raytheon Missiles & Defense. Collins Aerospace focuses on aircraft systems and components, while Pratt & Whitney is renowned for its aircraft engines. Raytheon Intelligence & Space provides advanced sensors and software solutions, and Raytheon Missiles & Defense develops missile systems and air defense technologies. Committed to innovation, Raytheon Technologies invests heavily in research and development to enhance its capabilities in areas such as artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and next-generation defense systems. The company plays a critical role in national security and has a significant presence in various global markets, partnering with governments and defense agencies worldwide. Raytheon Technologies' mission is to provide cutting-edge solutions that ensure the safety and security of people and nations through technology that defines the future of aerospace and defense.
